app.revision_history: Adding new procs for auto incremental compile flow
app.name: incrcompile
app.summary: This is a collection of utility application for Incremental flow

proc.name: analyze_critical_path
proc.summary: highlight reused pins of given timing paths given by 'get_timing_paths' command

proc.name: disable_auto_incremental_compile
proc.summary: Disables the auto detection and enablement of incremental flow.

proc.name: enable_auto_incremental_compile
proc.summary: Enables the auto detection and enablement of incremental flow.
